animeTitle: Doraemon Movie 05: Nobita no Makai Daibouken
animeDescription: Having dreamed of being in a world of magic, Nobita and Doraemon used the what-if-telephone-booth gadget to turn the world into one that is based on magic instead of science. Little did they know that demons exist and threaten this magical world.(Source: ANN)
